text: Current Medical Science is a bimonthly peer-reviewed general medical journal. It was established in 1981 and is published by Springer Science+Business Media in a partnership with China's Huazhong University of Science and Technology. The editor-in-chief is Jian-guo Chen. According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2017 impact factor of 0.948. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Springer Science+Business Media academic journals Category:Publications established in 1981 Category:Bimonthly journals Category:General medical journals Category:Multilingual journals
title: Current Medical Science
